name: $SHIB to the moon
description:
- GAME UNDER DEVELOPMENT - Tutorial Browser Version:

If Chrome is not working, please use Firefox, Safari or Edge.

Press the red button to start playing.

Move the Rocket by using AS / ←→ on the keyboard and avoid the other coins until you reach the MOON!

If you are playing from mobile browser, Unity WebGl doesn't support stationary touch, so, in order to move the Rocket you have to keep dragging the fingers on the desired direction. I recommend to download the APK for your Android device.

Tutorial Mobile Version:

Tap the red button to start playing.

Move the Rocket by touching the screen (Left half of the screen moves left, right half moves right) and avoid the other coins until you reach the MOON!

Shiba Inu Token

$SHIB to the moon is a tribute to Shiba Inu Token, made by one solo dev.

Donations

If you liked the game please consider to donate to support my works.

I accept $SHIB as donation too!
Address: 0x57dCe7E4FD5f94cc153895bDB8752436002AA200

Changelog

Version 1.0.3dev

- Added compatibility for many display aspect ratios

- In the web browser version the links will open in a new window
